pageContext.claim: “Just got back only to hear of a last minute change allowing a Never Trumper attorney to help Robert Mueller with his testimony before Congress tomorrow. What a disgrace to our system. Never heard of this before. VERY UNFAIR, SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED. A rigged Witch Hunt!”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing wrong with special counsel Robert Mueller to be accompanied by one of his aides when he testified before Congress. The attorney was sworn in as witness for the Intelligence Committee hearing, but did not speak.
